text:
<@U0679S1NPKL> We can certainly help you with your requirements and would like to inform you that Dotsquares Technologies, a HubSpot partner, is pleased to have won the HubSpot Themes Challenge 2021. With extensive experience in theme development, we offer competitive rates for creative digital design and development. To discuss your requirements further, please email us at <mailto:dsHubSpot@dotsquares.com|dsHubSpot@dotsquares.com>. Explore our developed themes here: <https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/website?eco_providers=Dotsquares%20Lt>

Additionally, I've provided more details via direct message along with our standard rates.

Hi Priscilla,

We have developed 7+ HubSpot themes and 25+ HubSpot Modules on Marketplace. We are also a Bonus Prize Winner of the "HubSpot Theme Challenge 2021"  <https://devpost.com/software/twentyone-HubSpot-cms-theme>

Profile <https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/solutions/hub-devs>

Hi <@U0679S1NPKL> ,
I would suggest  <@UPDDTPW3H> for this job. He has significant skills and experience handing these work. I had a good experience working with him and still in-touch for ongoing work in weekly basis.
